skills.name: SOLAR EYE
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• Remove One Beneficial Effect from each enemy.
• Reduce the MAX HP of enemies by 5%.
• Damage increases the higher the enemy’s MAX HP.

skills.name: ETERNAL DROUGHT
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to Lower Power and Fury Generation for 2 turns.
• Damage increases the higher the enemy’s MAX HP.

skills.name: DAMNATION
desc: • Grant Attack Up and 100% Critical Strike Chance chance to all allies for 3 turns.
• Inflict Seal, Flame, Exhaust, or Doom on all enemies for 5 turns.
• Instantly grant an Extra Turn to all allies.
